course_description: This course introduces students to the main elements of Arab Culture and to the various aspects of social life in the modern Arab World. In English; no knowledge of Arabic required.
sections: Class Nbr: 1588, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: Cornell/Hosseini Nassab, Status: Open
